Dear Mr Parrott:
Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above
referenced facility.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact Deborah L. Clark, Area Manager, at (906) 228-
2852.
Sincerely,
Don Collier, Licensing Consultant

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP270201149
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Human Services
Licensee Address: 235 S. Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48909
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Scott Parrott, Administrator
Ismael Ahmed, Designee
Name of Facility: Gogebic and Ontonagon County DHS
Facility Address: 301 E. Lead Street
Bessemer, MI 49911
Facility Telephone #: (906) 663-6200
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, FIA
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Gogebic and Ontonagon County DHS requested and it has been approved to
change the terms of their approval to include the addition of Adoption Evaluation and
Adoption Placement.
III. Methodology
Gogebic and Ontonagon County DHS requested the change in terms and submitted
Program Statements and Program Policies.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Gogebic and Ontonagon County DHS submitted Program Statements and Program
Policies on 09/10/2010. These were approved and the terms of the approval were
changed on 09/13/2010.
V. Recommendation
I recommend that the terms of the Approval for Gogebic and Ontonagon County
DHS be changed to include Adoption Evaluation and Adoption Placement.
10/28/2010
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
October 28, 2010
________________________________________
Linda Lee for Deborah Clark Date
Area Manager
